title: Which port ranges do I set up for  QoS on router for league?
body: currently I have a lot of internet speed. and my usual ping is ~50. but there is no cap on how much bandwidth a single stream uses so when someone uses netflix I get lag spikes. am trying to set up QoS for league. which ports does the game use for both client and pvp.net (in game)

replies.body: I'm not 100% sure how to properly setup QoS options for a router myself, but if you reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) they might be able to help walk you through those settings.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mHtPA3qE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-06T01:10:51.111+0000)
>
> I'm not 100% sure how to properly setup QoS options for a router myself, but if you reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) they might be able to help walk you through those settings.
